name: Sachi Saheli New Ayurvedic Tonic 205ml
description: Ayurvedic tonic for women's wellness with 67 herbal extracts
productHighlights: Ayurvedic blend of 67 herbs for women's wellness | Contains Ashoka, Shatavari, Dashmula, Ashwagandha, Brahmi, and Arjuna for hormonal balance and uterine health | Helps relieve menstrual cramps and irregular periods | Enhances digestion, metabolism, and detoxification | Helps to keep the body active and energetic | Enriched with Mulethi, Haritaki, Giloy, and Manjistha for improved immunity, energy, and clear skin | Comes with 20 tablets free
productDescription: Sachi Saheli New Ayurvedic Tonic is used for boosting metabolism, promoting hormonal balance, and alleviating pelvic pain. It is a viscous concentrated aqueous solution of 67 different herbal extracts, such as Ashwagandha, Pipali, Brahmi, Ajwain, Dushmool, Arjuna, and Mulethi. The combination of these herbs delivers a vast range of benefits in various ailments related to women's health. Sachi Saheli removes toxins from the body and provides inner strength to the body and skin as well.
ingredients: Ashoka (Saraca Asoca): Supports female reproductive health and healthy menstrual cycle | Shatavari (Asparagus Racemosus): Nourishes reproductive tissues and supports hormonal balance | Dashmula: A blend of ten roots that supports uterine health and relieves discomfort | Ashwagandha (Withania Somnifera): Adaptogen that reduces stress and supports overall vitality | Brahmi (Bacopa Monnieri): Enhances cognitive function and mental clarity | Arjuna (Terminalia Arjuna): Supports cardiovascular health and overall wellness
keyUses: Hormonal Balance: Helps maintain hormonal equilibrium during menstrual cycles | Menstrual Support: Reduces excessive bleeding and eases menstrual discomfort | Digestive Health: Improves digestion and metabolism | Energy Boost: Provides sustained energy and reduces fatigue | Detoxification: Helps remove toxins from the body | Skin Health: Promotes clear and healthy skin
howToUse: Take 2 teaspoons (10ml) twice daily with water or milk | Best taken after meals | Can be mixed with warm water or milk for better absorption | Continue for at least 3 months for optimal results | Consult a healthcare practitioner for personalized dosage
safetyInformation: Store in a cool and dry place away from direct sunlight | Keep out of reach of children | Do not exceed the recommended dosage | Pregnant and lactating women should consult a physician before use | Not suitable for children below 12 years | Shake well before use
additionalInformation: Storage: Store below 25°C, Keep in original packaging, Protect from moisture | Dosage: Adults: 10ml twice daily, Children: Not recommended | Shelf Life: 24 months from date of manufacture
faqs: Q: How long does it take to show results? A: Results may vary, but typically noticeable improvements are seen within 2-3 weeks of regular use | Q: Can it be taken during menstruation? A: Yes, it is safe and beneficial to take during menstruation | Q: Are there any side effects? A: When taken as directed, it is generally safe. However, consult a doctor if you experience any adverse effects | Q: Can it be taken with other medications? A: Consult your healthcare provider before combining with other medications

productDescription: Baidyanath Kumari Asav is a traditional Ayurvedic digestive tonic made with Aloe Vera (Kumari) and other natural herbs. It helps improve digestion, relieves constipation, supports liver health, and aids in detoxification. The formulation is also beneficial for managing menstrual disorders and boosting overall immunity.

keyUses: Digestive Health: Improves digestion and relieves constipation | Liver Support: Supports liver function and detoxification | Menstrual Health: Helps manage menstrual irregularities | Immunity Boost: Strengthens immune system | Energy: Provides natural energy and vitality
